text: Q. On a 2200 m long circular track, Sarita and Kavita drove their cycles from the same point but in opposite directions with speeds 20 km/h and 16 km/h, respectively. After how much time will they meet again for the first time?
solution_html:
Relative speed (opposite directions) = 20 + 16 = 36 km/h = 10 m/s.
Time to first meet = track length / relative speed = 2200 / 10 = 220 s = 3 min 40 s.
